snippet.title: WORLD OF HORROR – Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
WORLD OF HORROR is available now on Steam Early Access, Xbox Game Preview for Windows 10, and Xbox Game Pass for PC (beta).

http://wohgame.com

--

From another dimension, the Old Gods have come. In hospitals, abandoned classrooms, quiet apartments, and dark forests, strange appearances and unexplainable phenomena test the sanity of the town’s residents. Is it retribution, pure chaos, or the unknowable machinations of beings beyond our comprehension?

Choose from five characters and solve over 10 mysteries in Early Access. Each perplexing case unravels into a series of random encounters with nightmarish figures inspired by the works of horror legends Junji Ito and H.P. Lovecraft. Invoke dark rituals, cast life-prolonging spells, and scavenge for makeshift weapons and other items crucial to survival. Every mystery harbors multiple endings — for those that can survive that long.

Follow 
@panstasz
 and 
@YsbrydGames
 on Twitter and visit the official WORLD OF HORROR Discord and website.
